db:abstract.db:para: This is a collection of QML Animation examples.

db:article.db:para: This is a collection of small QML examples relating to animation. Each example is a small QML file emphasizing a particular type or feature.
ColorAnimation demonstrates using a color animation to fade a sky from day to night.
PropertyAnimation demonstrates using a number animation to bounce a circle up and down.
Animators demonstrates using a animators to bounce an icon up and down.
Behaviors demonstrates using behaviors to animate moving a rectangle to whereever you click.
Wiggly Text demonstrates using more complex behaviors to animate and wiggle some text around as you drag it. It does this by assigning a complex binding to each letter:
db:article.db:programlisting: x: follow ? follow.x + follow.width : container.width / 6 y: follow ? follow.y : container.height / 2
db:article.db:para: Then, it uses behaviors to animate the movement on each letter:
db:article.db:programlisting: Behavior on x { enabled: container.animated; SpringAnimation { spring: 3; damping: 0.3; mass: 1.0 } } Behavior on y { enabled: container.animated; SpringAnimation { spring: 3; damping: 0.3; mass: 1.0 } }
db:article.db:para: Tv Tennis demonstrates using more complex behaviors to get paddles following a ball for an infinite game. Again a binding which depends on other values is applied to the position and a behavior provided the animation.
db:article.db:programlisting: y: ball.direction == 'left' ? ball.y - 45 : page.height/2 -45; Behavior on y { SpringAnimation{ velocity: 300 } }
db:article.db:para: Easing Curves shows off all the easing curves available in Qt Quick animations.

Note that there is also the implicit 'base state' from properties set directly on objects.

PathAnimation animates an image along a beizer curve using a PathAnimation.
PathInterpolator animates an image along the same beizer curve, using a PathInterpolator instead.
